title: Enhancing Service Quality Practical Competencies: Exploring Mathematical Concepts Using Robotics and Block-Based Programming

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: By controlling robot movement through block-based programming, learners achieve over 85% target point reachability on a 2D coordinate plane

In simulation environments, learners achieve over 4 points on a rubric evaluating computational thinking application (decomposition, abstraction, algorithmic thinking) during mathematical problem-solving
Over 90% of learners submit visual representations of mathematical concepts through collaborative activities
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
